sqlMap.sql:
FROM RS1010M A
ON N.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND N.RS_NO = A.RS_NO AND N.BRANCH_CD = #branchCd#
INNER JOIN CT1020M F ON F.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND F.BRANCH_CD = A.BRANCH_CD INNER JOIN CM4000M G ON G.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND G.CD_CLS = 'CT2050' AND G.CLS_CAT = '3' AND G.CD = A.RSST_CLS INNER JOIN CM4000M K ON K.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND K.CD_CLS = 'CT2030' AND K.CLS_CAT = '3' AND K.CD = A.RS_NO3 LEFT OUTER JOIN CM4000M U ON U.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND U.CD_CLS = 'CT2040' AND U.CLS_CAT = '3' AND U.CD = A.ITEM_CLS LEFT OUTER JOIN CT2000M V ON V.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND V.VEND_NO = A.VEND_NO LEFT OUTER join (SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(a.RS_CD,1,14) AS RS_CD , STUFF(( SELECT ',' +VEND_NAME FROM RS1000M b INNER JOIN CT2000M b1 ON b1.CORP_CD = b.CORP_CD AND b1.VEND_NO = b.VEND_NO WHERE b.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND b.RS_CD LIKE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.RS_CD,1,14),'%') FOR XML PATH('') ),1,1,'') AS VEND FROM RS1000M a) W ON W.RS_CD LIKE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(A.RS_CD,1,14),'%')
(A.CORP_CD = #corpCd#)
(A.RS_CD = #searchCondition8#)
CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.RS_STDT, 23) BETWEEN #searchCondition1# AND #searchCondition2#
CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.RS_ENDT, 23) BETWEEN #searchCondition1# AND #searchCondition2#
(A.RS_NO3 = #searchCondition5#)
(A.RSST_CLS = #searchCondition6#)
(A.RS_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#searchWord#,'%') OR A.RS_CD LIKE CONCAT ('%',#searchWord#,'%') OR V.VEND_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#searchWord#,'%'))
(A.RS_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#searchWord#,'%'))
(V.VEND_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#searchWord#,'%'))
(A.RS_CD LIKE CONCAT ('%',#searchWord#,'%'))
sqlMap.select:
/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101RsPlanView */
SELECT A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RS_NO AS rsNo , A.BRANCH_CD AS branchCd , F.BRANCH_NAME AS branchNm , A.RS_CD AS rsCd , A.REG_DT AS regDt , A.RS_STDT AS rsStdt , A.RS_ENDT AS rsEndt , A.RS_PTC AS rsPtc , A.RS_PPS AS rsPps , A.RS_NO3 AS rsNo3 , K.CD_NAME AS rsNo3Nm , A.RS_DRT AS rsDrt , A.RS_SCNT AS rsScnt , A.RS_MSCNT AS rsMscnt , A.RSST_CLS AS rsstCls , G.CD_NAME AS rsstClsNm , A.REP_DT AS repDt , A.VISIT_CNT AS visitCnt , A.DUPL_YN AS duplYn , A.RS_NAME AS rsName , A.RS_PAY AS rsPay , A.IRBSM_YN AS irbsmYn , A.ITEM_CLS AS itemCls , U.CD_NAME AS itemClsNm , A.ITEM_NAME AS itemName , A.VEND_NO AS vendNo , V.VEND_NAME AS vendName , A.VMNG_NAME AS vmngName , A.VMNGHP_NO AS vmnghpNo , A.VMNG_EMAIL AS vmngEmail , A.DATA_LOCK_YN AS dataLockYn , A.DEL_YN AS delYn , A.MK_CLS AS mkCls , CONCAT(A.RS_NO1,A.RS_NO2) AS setRsNo FROM RS1010M A LEFT OUTER JOIN RS5000M H ON H.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND H.RS_NO = A.RS_NO INNER JOIN CT1020M F ON F.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND F.BRANCH_CD = A.BRANCH_CD INNER JOIN CM4000M G ON G.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND G.CD_CLS = 'CT2050' AND G.CLS_CAT = '3' AND G.CD = A.RSST_CLS INNER JOIN CM4000M K ON K.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND K.CD_CLS = 'CT2030' AND K.CLS_CAT = '3' AND K.CD = A.RS_NO3 LEFT OUTER JOIN CM4000M U ON U.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND U.CD_CLS = 'CT2040' AND U.CLS_CAT = '3' AND U.CD = A.ITEM_CLS LEFT OUTER JOIN CT2000M V ON V.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND V.VEND_NO = A.VEND_NO WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo#

/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101View */
SELECT A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RS_NO AS rsNo , F.RS_NAME AS rsName , A.ITEM_NAME AS itemName , A.CHK_STDT AS chkStdt , A.CHK_ENDT AS chkEndt , A.CONT AS cont , A.CHK_TRM AS chkTrm , A.CHK_CNT AS chkCnt , A.DSP_NAME1 AS dspName1 , A.DSP_NAME2 AS dspName2 , A.DSP_NAME3 AS dspName3 , A.DSP_NAME4 AS dspName4 , A.DSP_NAME5 AS dspName5 , A.TCHK_CNT AS tchkCnt , A.RE_YN AS reYn , A.USE_YN AS useYn , A.DATA_REGDT AS dataRegdt , A.DATA_REGNT AS dataRegnt FROM CR3200M A INNER JOIN RS1000M F ON F.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND F.RS_NO = A.RS_NO WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.CORP_CD , A.RS_NO
sqlMap.delete:
/* Ecr0101DAO.deleteEcr0101 */
DELETE FROM CR3200M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo#
sqlMap.insert:
/* Ecr0101DAO.insertEcr0101 */
INSERT CR3200M( CORP_CD , RS_NO , ITEM_NAME , CHK_STDT , CHK_ENDT , CONT , CHK_TRM , CHK_CNT , DSP_NAME1 , DSP_NAME2 , DSP_NAME3 , DSP_NAME4 , DSP_NAME5 , TCHK_CNT , RE_YN , USE_YN , DATA_REGDT , DATA_REGNT ) VALUES( #corpCd# , #rsNo# , #itemName# , #chkStdt# , #chkEndt# , #cont# , #chkTrm# , #chkCnt# , #dspName1# , #dspName2# , #dspName3# , #dspName4# , #dspName5# , #tchkCnt# , #reYn# , #useYn# , GETDATE() , #dataRegnt# )
sqlMap.update:
/* Ecr0101DAO.updateEcr0101 */
UPDATE CR3200M SET ITEM_NAME = #itemName# , CHK_STDT = #chkStdt# , CHK_ENDT = #chkEndt# , CONT = #cont# , CHK_TRM = #chkTrm# , CHK_CNT = #chkCnt# , DSP_NAME1 = #dspName1# , DSP_NAME2 = #dspName2# , DSP_NAME3 = #dspName3# , DSP_NAME4 = #dspName4# , DSP_NAME5 = #dspName5# , TCHK_CNT = #tchkCnt# , RE_YN = #reYn# , USE_YN = #useYn# , DATA_REGDT = GETDATE() , DATA_REGNT = #dataRegnt# WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo#
sqlMap.sql: FROM RS2010M A LEFT OUTER JOIN SB1000M C ON C.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND C.RSJ_NO = A.RSJ_NO INNER JOIN RS1010M D ON D.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND D.RS_NO = A.RS_NO WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND A.CFM_YN = 'Y' AND A.RSI_NO3 IS NOT NULL
sqlMap.insert: /* Ecr0101DAO..insertEcr0101ItemUse */ INSERT CR3210M( CORP_CD , RS_NO , RSJ_NO , CHK_STDT , CHK_ENDT , CHK_CNT , TCHK_CNT , RE_YN , ST_YN , REMK , DATA_REGDT , DATA_REGNT) SELECT A.CORP_CD , A.RS_NO , A.RSJ_NO , #chkStdt# , #chkEndt# , 0 , ((DATEDIFF(DD, B.CHK_STDT, B.CHK_ENDT) + 1)/B.CHK_TRM) * B.CHK_TRM * B.CHK_CNT , '' , 'N' ,'' , GETDATE() , #dataRegnt# FROM RS2000M A INNER JOIN cr3200M B on B.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD and B.RS_NO = A.RS_NO WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND A.CFM_YN = 'Y' AND A.RSI_NO3 IS NOT NULL
sqlMap.select:
/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101RsjMkList */
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by A.RS_NO DESC) rownum , A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RS_NO AS rsNo , A.TEMP_NO AS tempNo , A.RSI_NO AS rsiNo , A.MK_YN AS mkYn , A.MK_DT AS mkDt , A.REMK AS remk , A.DATA_REGDT AS dataRegdt , A.DATA_REGNT AS dataRegnt , B.TITLE AS title , B.SV_STDT AS svStdt , B.SV_ENDT AS svEndt , B.MT_CLS AS mtCls , B.CONTENT AS content , B.SV_SEQ AS svSeq , B.SPAGE_CNT AS spageCnt , C.RSJ_NO AS rsjNo , D.RS_CD AS rsCd , D.TPAGE_CNT AS tpageCnt , E.TEMP_TYPE AS tempType , E.UPAGE_CNT AS upageCnt , CASE E.TEMP_TYPE WHEN '4000' THEN 'Y' WHEN '4010' THEN 'Y' WHEN '4110' THEN 'Y' WHEN '4020' THEN 'Y' WHEN '4120' THEN 'Y' WHEN '4080' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS svyYn , CONCAT(LOWER(A.CORP_CD),LOWER(A.RS_NO),LOWER(A.RSI_NO),LOWER(A.TEMP_NO)) AS mapKey , F.TEMP_TYPE AS tempType2 , F.TERM_TYPE AS termType , D.MK_CLS AS mkCls , CONCAT(D.RS_NO1,D.RS_NO2,'-',A.RSI_NO) AS setRsNo FROM CR2120M A INNER JOIN CR2110M B ON A.CORP_CD = B.CORP_CD AND A.RS_NO = B.RS_NO AND A.TEMP_NO = B.TEMP_NO INNER JOIN CR2100M E ON E.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND E.TEMP_NO = A.TEMP_NO AND E.TEMP_TYPE <> '1030' LEFT OUTER JOIN CR2020M F ON F.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND F.TEMP_NO = A.TEMP_NO INNER JOIN RS2010M C ON C.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND C.RS_NO = A.RS_NO AND C.RSI_NO = A.RSI_NO INNER JOIN RS1010M D ON D.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND D.RS_NO = A.RS_NO WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND A.RSI_NO = #rsiNo# ORDER BY A.CORP_CD, A.RS_NO, A.RSI_NO, B.SV_SEQ

/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101Rsj */
SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by A.RS_NO DESC) rownum , A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RS_NO AS rsNo , A.SUB_NO AS subNo , A.RSJ_NO AS rsjNo , A.RSI_NO AS rsiNo , A.RSJ_NAME AS rsjName , C.BR_DT AS brDt , A.AGE AS age , A.GEN_YN AS genYn , CASE A.GEN_YN WHEN '1' THEN '남' WHEN '2' THEN '여' END AS genYnNm , C.HP_NO AS hpNo , A.ETC AS etc , A.DOUT_YN AS doutYn , A.DOUT_CLS AS doutCls , A.DOUT_CONT AS doutCont , A.DOUT_DT AS doutDt FROM RS2010M A LEFT OUTER JOIN SB1000M C ON C.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND C.RSJ_NO = A.RSJ_NO WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND A.RSI_NO = #rsjNo#) Z

/*Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101Cnt */
SELECT count(*) totalCnt FROM CR3200M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo#

/*Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101ChkCnt */
SELECT count(*) totalCnt FROM CR3210M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND CHK_CNT > 0
sqlMap.delete:
/* Ecr0101DAO.deleteEcr0101Chk */
DELETE FROM CR3210M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo#
sqlMap.select:
/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101Map */
SELECT A.CORP_CD , A.RS_NO , B.RSJ_NO , A.ITEM_NAME , B.CHK_STDT , B.CHK_ENDT , A.CONT , A.CHK_TRM , A.CHK_CNT , A.DSP_NAME1 , A.DSP_NAME2 , A.DSP_NAME3 , A.DSP_NAME4 , A.DSP_NAME5 , A.TCHK_CNT , A.USE_YN , A.RE_YN , A.DATA_REGDT , A.DATA_REGNT FROM CR3200M A INNER JOIN CR3210M B ON A.CORP_CD = B.CORP_CD AND A.RS_NO = B.RS_NO WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND B.RSJ_NO = #searchCondition1#

/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101PopList */
SELECT A.CORP_CD , A.RS_NO , A.RSJ_NO , A.CHK_DT , A.CHK_CNT , A.CHK1 , A.CHK1_DT , A.CHK2 , A.CHK2_DT , A.CHK3 , A.CHK3_DT , A.CHK4 , A.CHK4_DT , A.CHK5 , A.CHK5_DT , A.REMK , A.DATA_REGDT , A.DATA_REGNT FROM CR3240M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND A.RSJ_NO = #searchCondition1# ORDER BY A.CHK_DT ASC
sqlMap.delete:
/* Ecr0101DAO.deleteEcr0101AjaxChkDtDel */
DELETE FROM CR3240M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND RSJ_NO = #rsjNo# AND CHK_DT = #chkDt#
sqlMap.select:
/*Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101ChkDtCnt */
SELECT count(*) totalCnt FROM CR3240M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND RSJ_NO = #rsjNo# AND CHK_DT = #chkDt#
sqlMap.insert: /* Ecr0101DAO.insertEcr0101ChkDt */ INSERT CR3240M( CORP_CD , RS_NO , RSJ_NO , CHK_DT , CHK_CNT , CHK1 , CHK1_DT , CHK2 , CHK2_DT , CHK3 , CHK3_DT , CHK4 , CHK4_DT , CHK5 , CHK5_DT , REMK , DATA_REGDT , DATA_REGNT ) VALUES( #corpCd# , #rsNo# , #rsjNo# , #chkDt# , #chkCnt# , #chk1# , CASE WHEN #chk1# = 'Y' THEN GETDATE() END , #chk2# , CASE WHEN #chk2# = 'Y' THEN GETDATE() END , #chk3# , CASE WHEN #chk3# = 'Y' THEN GETDATE() END , #chk4# , CASE WHEN #chk4# = 'Y' THEN GETDATE() END , #chk5# , CASE WHEN #chk5# = 'Y' THEN GETDATE() END , #remk# , GETDATE() , #dataRegnt# )
sqlMap.update:
/* Ecr0101DAO.updateEcr0101ChkCnt */
UPDATE CR3210M SET CHK_CNT = ISNULL((SELECT SUM(CHK_CNT) FROM CR3240M B WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND RSJ_NO = #rsjNo# GROUP BY RSJ_NO),0) WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND RSJ_NO = #rsjNo#
sqlMap.select:
/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101ChkmgView */
SELECT A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RS_NO AS rsNo , A.RSJ_NO AS rsjNo , A.CHK_DT AS chkDt , A.CHK_CNT AS chkCnt , A.CHK1 AS chk1 , A.CHK1_DT AS chk1Dt , A.CHK2 AS chk2 , A.CHK2_DT AS chk2Dt , A.CHK3 AS chk3 , A.CHK3_DT AS chk3Dt , A.CHK4 AS chk4 , A.CHK4_DT AS chk4Dt , A.CHK5 AS chk5 , A.CHK5_DT AS chk5Dt , A.REMK AS remk , A.DATA_REGDT AS dataRegdt , A.DATA_REGNT AS dataRegnt , B.RS_CD AS rsCd FROM CR3240M A INNER JOIN RS1000M B ON B.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND B.RS_NO = A.RS_NO WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND A.RSJ_NO = #rsjNo# AND A.CHK_DT = #chkDt#
sqlMap.update:
/* EEcr0101DAO.updateEcr0101AjaxSaveChkmg */
UPDATE CR3240M SET CHK_CNT = #chkCnt# , CHK1 = #chk1# , CHK2 = #chk2# , CHK3 = #chk3# , CHK4 = #chk4# , CHK5 = #chk5#
, CHK1_DT = GETDATE()
, CHK2_DT = GETDATE()
, CHK3_DT = GETDATE()
, CHK4_DT = GETDATE()
, CHK5_DT = GETDATE()
, REMK = #remk# , DATA_REGDT = GETDATE() , DATA_REGNT = #dataRegnt# WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND RSJ_NO = #rsjNo# AND CHK_DT = #chkDt#
sqlMap.select:
/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101RsjUseExcel */
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by A.RS_NO DESC) rownum , A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RS_NO AS rsNo , A.RSJ_NO AS rsjNo , A.CHK_DT AS chkDt , A.CHK_CNT AS chkCnt , CASE A.CHK1 WHEN 'Y' THEN '사용' WHEN 'N' THEN '미사용' END AS chk1 , CASE A.CHK2 WHEN 'Y' THEN '사용' WHEN 'N' THEN '미사용' END AS chk2 , CASE A.CHK3 WHEN 'Y' THEN '사용' WHEN 'N' THEN '미사용' END AS chk3 , CASE A.CHK4 WHEN 'Y' THEN '사용' WHEN 'N' THEN '미사용' END AS chk4 , CASE A.CHK5 WHEN 'Y' THEN '사용' WHEN 'N' THEN '미사용' END AS chk5 , A.CHK1_DT AS chk1Dt , A.CHK2_DT AS chk2Dt , A.CHK3_DT AS chk3Dt , A.CHK4_DT AS chk4Dt , A.CHK5_DT AS chk5Dt , A.REMK AS remk , A.DATA_REGDT AS dataRegdt , A.DATA_REGNT AS dataRegnt , B.RSJ_NAME AS rsjName , B.HP_NO AS hpNo FROM CR3240M A INNER JOIN SB1000M B ON B.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND B.RSJ_NO = A.RSJ_NO WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND A.RSJ_NO = #rsjNo# ORDER BY A.CORP_CD , A.RS_NO , A.RSJ_NO , A.CHK_DT
sqlMap.insert: /* Ecr0101DAO.insertEcr0101AjaxSaveStep */ INSERT CR2120M( CORP_CD , RS_NO , TEMP_NO , RSI_NO , MK_YN , DATA_REGDT , DATA_REGNT ) VALUES( #corpCd# , #rsNo# , #tempNo# , #rsiNo# , 'N' , GETDATE() , #dataRegnt# )
sqlMap.select:
/*Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101AjaxSaveStepCnt */
SELECT count(*) totalCnt FROM CR2120M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND TEMP_NO = #tempNo# AND RSI_NO = #rsiNo#
sqlMap.update:
/* Ecr0101DAO.updateEcr0101RsjUse */
UPDATE CR3210M SET RE_YN = #reYn# , ST_YN = #stYn# , REMK = #remk# , DATA_REGDT = GETDATE() , DATA_REGNT = #dataRegnt# WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND RSJ_NO = #rsjNo#
sqlMap.select:
/* ech0212.selectEcr0101eCrfList */
SELECT A.CORP_CD , A.RS_NO , A.TEMP_NO , A.SV_SEQ , A.SV_CNT , A.TITLE , A.CONTENT , A.SV_STDT , A.SV_ENDT , A.MT_CLS , A.DATA_REGDT , A.DATA_REGNT , B.TEMP_TYPE , C.CD_NAME FROM CR2110M A INNER JOIN CR2100M B ON B.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND B.TEMP_NO = A.TEMP_NO INNER JOIN CM4000M C ON C.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND C.CD_CLS = 'CT3020' AND C.CD = B.TEMP_TYPE WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo#

/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101ListCrfFile */ SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by A.RS_NO DESC) rownum , A.CORP_CD AS corpCd , A.RS_NO AS rsNo , A.SUB_NO AS subNo , A.RSJ_NO AS rsjNo , A.RSI_NO AS rsiNo , C.RSJ_NAME AS rsjName , C.AGE AS age , D.RS_CD AS rsCd , C.GEN_YN AS genYn , CASE C.GEN_YN WHEN '1' THEN '남' WHEN '2' THEN '여' END AS genYnNm , A.ETC AS etc , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CR2110M D WHERE D.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND D.RS_NO = A.RS_NO) AS tmplCnt , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CR2120M E WHERE E.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND E.RS_NO = A.RS_NO AND E.RSI_NO = A.RSI_NO AND E.MK_YN = 'Y') AS mkCnt , CONCAT(LOWER(A.CORP_CD),LOWER(A.RS_NO),LOWER(A.RSI_NO)) AS mapKey FROM RS2010M A INNER JOIN RS2010M C ON C.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND C.RS_NO = A.RS_NO AND C.RSI_NO = A.RSI_NO INNER JOIN RS1010M D ON D.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND D.RS_NO = A.RS_NO WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND A.CFM_YN = 'Y' AND A.RSI_NO3 IS NOT NULL
) Z ORDER BY Z.corpCd, z.rsNo, z.rsiNo
sqlMap.insert:
/* Ecr0101DAO.insertEcr0101Sub */
DECLARE @R_CORP_CD NVARCHAR(0008) = #corpCd# DECLARE @V_RS_NO NVARCHAR(0020) = #rsNo# DECLARE @P_RTN_KEY INT = 0 DECLARE @BDT04 NVARCHAR(0004) DECLARE @BDT06 NVARCHAR(0006) DECLARE @BDT10 NVARCHAR(0010) SET @BDT10 = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 23) SET @BDT04 = SUBSTRING(DBO.UFN_DTG08(@BDT10), 1, 4) SET @BDT06 = SUBSTRING(DBO.UFN_DTG08(@BDT10), 1, 6)
SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), ISNULL(MAX(A.SUB_NO), 0)) + 1) as subNo FROM RS2010M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = @R_CORP_CD AND A.RS_NO = @V_RS_NO
INSERT RS2010M( CORP_CD , RS_NO , SUB_NO , RSI_NO1 , RSI_NO2 , RSI_NO3 , RSI_NO , RSJ_NO , APPSTA_CLS , APP_STDT , APP_ENDT , ETC , APP_YN , POOL_YN , FIRST_ST , CFM_YN , DATA_REGDT , DATA_REGNT , RS_CD , RSJ_NAME , GEN_YN , AGE , DOUT_YN ) VALUES( #corpCd# , #rsNo# , #subNo# , #rsiNo1# , #rsiNo2# , #rsiNo3# , #rsiNo# , #rsjNo# , #appstaCls# , #appStdt# , #appEndt# , #etc# , #appYn# , #poolYn# , #firstSt# , #cfmYn# , GETDATE() , #dataRegnt# , #rsCd# , #rsjName# , #genYn# , #age# , 'N' )
sqlMap.select:
/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101RsNoRsCd */
SELECT DISTINCT(A.RS_CD) AS rsCd FROM RS2010M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo#
sqlMap.update: /* Ecr0101DAO.updateEcr0101AjaxReqMkFin */ UPDATE RS1010M SET MK_CLS = '1020' , DATA_REGNT = #dataRegnt# , DATA_REGDT = GETDATE() WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo#
sqlMap.select:
/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101MkCnt */
SELECT COUNT(*) totalMkCnt FROM CR2120M A INNER JOIN RS2010M C ON C.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND C.RS_NO = A.RS_NO AND C.RSI_NO = A.RSI_NO AND C.DOUT_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN CR2100M B ON B.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND B.TEMP_NO = A.TEMP_NO AND B.TEMP_TYPE <> '1030' WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo# AND A.MK_YN = 'N'

/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101RsiCnt */
SELECT COUNT(*) totalRsiCnt FROM RS2010M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo#

/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101SetCnt */
SELECT COUNT(*) totalSetCnt FROM CR2120M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND A.RS_NO = #rsNo#
sqlMap.update: /* Ecr0101DAO.updateEcr0101RsReqMkFin */ UPDATE RS1010M SET MK_CLS = '1010' , DATA_REGNT = #dataRegnt# , DATA_REGDT = GETDATE() WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo#
/* Ecr0101DAO.updateEcr0101AjaxSaveEtc */ UPDATE RS2010M SET ETC = #etc# , DATA_REGNT = #dataRegnt# , DATA_REGDT = GETDATE() WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND SUB_NO = #subNo#
sqlMap.delete:
/* Ecr0101DAO.deleteEcr0101AjaxDelRsiNo */ DELETE RS2010M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND RSI_NO
#rsjSeq[]#

/* Ecr0101DAO.deleteEcr0101AjaxDelRsiNoTmpl */ DELETE CR2120M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND RSI_NO
#rsjSeq[]#
sqlMap.update:
/* Ecr0101DAO.updateEcr0101AjaxSaveScnt */ UPDATE RS1010M SET RS_SCNT = RS_SCNT - #delCnt#
WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo#

/* Ecr0101DAO.updateEcr0101AjaxSaveDout */ UPDATE RS2010M SET DOUT_CONT = #doutCont# , DOUT_YN = 'Y' , DOUT_DT = #doutDt# , DATA_REGNT = #dataRegnt# , DATA_REGDT = GETDATE() WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND SUB_NO = #subNo#

/* Ecr0101DAO.updateEcr0101AjaxDelDout */ UPDATE RS2010M SET DOUT_CONT = '' , DOUT_YN = 'N' , DOUT_DT = '' , DATA_REGNT = #dataRegnt# , DATA_REGDT = GETDATE() WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND SUB_NO = #subNo#
sqlMap.select:
/*Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101RsFinSetChkCnt */
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CR2110M A INNER JOIN CR2100M B ON B.CORP_CD = A.CORP_CD AND B.TEMP_NO = A.TEMP_NO AND B.TEMP_TYPE = '1030' WHERE A.CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo#
/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101ChkRsiNoCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM RS2010M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND RSI_NO = #rsiNo#
sqlMap.delete:
/* Ecr0101DAO.deleteEcr0101ReMkDelAnsw */
DELETE FROM CR3010M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND RSI_NO = #rsiNo# AND TEMP_NO = #tempNo#
sqlMap.update:
/* Ecr0101DAO.updateEcr0101ReMkCrfRs */
UPDATE RS1010M SET MK_YN = 'N' , MK_CLS = '1000' WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo#
sqlMap.select:
/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101SvyList */
SELECT ATTACH_NO AS attachNo , BOARD_NO AS boardNo , BOARD_TYPE AS boardType , ORG_FILE_NAME AS orgFileName , REG_FILE_NAME AS regFileName , FILE_KEY AS fileKey , REG_DATE AS regDate FROM CT7000M WHERE BOARD_NO = #boardSeq# AND BOARD_TYPE = #boardType#
/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101DupRsjList */ SELECT * , CONCAT('식별번호: ',RSI_NO,' 이름: ',RSJ_NAME,' 나이: ',AGE) AS vendNo FROM RS2010M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO = #rsNo# AND RSI_NO = #rsiNo#

/* Ecr0101DAO.selectEcr0101RsNo */ SELECT RS_NO AS rsNo , RS_NO AS rsNo , RS_STDT AS appStdt , RS_ENDT AS appEndt FROM RS1010M WHERE CORP_CD = #corpCd# AND RS_NO1 = #rsNo1# AND RS_NO2 = #rsNo2# AND RS_NO3 = #rsNo3# AND RS_NO4 = #rsNo4# AND RS_NO5 = #rsNo5# AND RS_NO6 = #rsNo6#
sqlMap.insert:
/* Ecr0101DAO.insertEcr0101RsjUpload */
DECLARE @R_CORP_CD NVARCHAR(0008) = #corpCd# DECLARE @V_RS_NO NVARCHAR(0020) = #rsNo# DECLARE @P_RTN_KEY INT = 0 DECLARE @BDT04 NVARCHAR(0004) DECLARE @BDT06 NVARCHAR(0006) DECLARE @BDT10 NVARCHAR(0010) SET @BDT10 = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 23) SET @BDT04 = SUBSTRING(DBO.UFN_DTG08(@BDT10), 1, 4) SET @BDT06 = SUBSTRING(DBO.UFN_DTG08(@BDT10), 1, 6)
SELECT CONVERT(NVARCHAR, CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 0), ISNULL(MAX(A.SUB_NO), 0)) + 1) as subNo FROM RS2010M A WHERE A.CORP_CD = @R_CORP_CD AND A.RS_NO = @V_RS_NO
INSERT RS2010M( CORP_CD , RS_NO , SUB_NO , RSI_NO1 , RSI_NO2 , RSI_NO3 , RSI_NO , RSJ_NO , APPSTA_CLS , APP_STDT , APP_ENDT , ETC , APP_YN , POOL_YN , FIRST_ST , CFM_YN , DATA_REGDT , DATA_REGNT , RS_CD , RSJ_NAME , GEN_YN , AGE , DOUT_YN ) VALUES( #corpCd# , #rsNo# , #subNo# , #rsiNo1# , #rsiNo2# , #rsiNo3# , #rsiNo# , #rsjNo# , #appstaCls# , #appStdt# , #appEndt# , #etc# , #appYn# , #poolYn# , #firstSt# , #cfmYn# , GETDATE() , #dataRegnt# , #rsCd# , #rsjName# , #genYn# , #age# , 'N' )
